snippet: Ms. Yousafzai, who was shot by Taliban gunmen for advocating for girls’ education, will require prolonged care to fully recover physically and psychologically, a military spokesman said on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Yousafzai, who was shot by Taliban gunmen for advocating for girls’ education, will require prolonged care to fully recover physically and psychologically, a military spokesman said on Monday.

headline.seo: Malala Yousafzai Is Sent to Britain for Medical Treatment
headline.main: Malala Yousafzai Is Sent to Britain for Medical Treatment
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Girl Is Sent to Britain
